you all really gotta get this game. blows WoW the fuck away

item.title: Aion 3.0 trailier
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:9, topic:315986”]there is a lot of content, its just everyone tries to fuckin compare a game to WoW[/quote]Sry but i will not pick up another mmo until Mortal Online is released. It blows every other mmo the fuck away in terms of innovative content and actually making it a mmorpg instead of a single player arcade game in a persistant world so ye.
